item.title: Alien Attack - First Java Game
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:13, topic:327426”]I know. The reason I added that was because the only way to see if a bullet intersects with a monster is to secretly draw a rectangle behind it. I can make the rectangle invisible, but I thought it might look weird if the bullets disappear and the monster is killed before it even hits the actual creature. I guess I could change it and see what you think…[/quote]I assumed that was the reason. I’d rather see that than an omniscient green square hovering behind the aliens attacking me. I COULD GET DISTRACTED, WORLD WOULD BE OVER, ETC.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Attack - First Java Game
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I know. The reason I added that was because the only way to see if a bullet intersects with a monster is to secretly draw a rectangle behind it. I can make the rectangle invisible, but I thought it might look weird if the bullets disappear and the monster is killed before it even hits the actual creature. I guess I could change it and see what you think…

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Attack - First Java Game
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

delicious:

When I tried to run it, the right and left input keys wouldn’t work, so I made a few edits if you don’t mind. I actually set the keyListener to the actual values of the right, left, space, and other keys. I found this to work better than trying to assign the values as a string. I have a little demo program that tells you what the keyValue is for the key you just pressed, in case you want it for future reference.

That makes no sense. The string is just the literal representation of the keyValue. It should not matter which you use.

Read full topic

item.title: Alien Attack - First Java Game
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

When I tried to run it, the right and left input keys wouldn’t work, so I made a few edits if you don’t mind. I actually set the keyListener to the actual values of the right, left, space, and other keys. I found this to work better than trying to assign the values as a string. I have a little demo program that tells you what the keyValue is for the key you just pressed, in case you want it for future reference.

item.title: Alien Attack - First Java Game
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well I decided to make a game with Java. (Finally)

This game is one of those where the aliens come in rows and you need to shoot them before they pass the line. I also implemented some of the features of other games, such as the pong game where you try to hit all of the blocks with a ball bounced with a paddle. The game has power ups, and gets rather hard in the last levels. There is a score algorithm as well.
More information can be found here: Alien Attack HomePage

Pictures: (Please note I am no good at computer drawings, so all of the sprites are ugly. I even forced my brother to draw the aliens)
EDIT: If you can make better pictures, send them to me! Keep the same image dimensions. Keep the plane images transparent background.



If you want to download everything (sprites included): http://uppit.com/v/V40JOMDW
Here is the entire code:

[code]import javax.swing.;
import java.awt.;
import java.awt.geom.;
import java.util.concurrent.;
import java.applet.;
import java.awt.event.;
import java.io.;
import java.awt.image.;
import java.util.;
import java.text.;

public class MainGame extends JDialog implements KeyListener {

public PaintSurface ps = new PaintSurface();
public boolean up, down, left, right = false;

public static void main(String[] args) {
	new MainGame();
}

public MainGame() {
	this.setSize(300, 400);  
	ps.setDimensions(300, 400);
	this.setLocationRelativeTo(null);
	this.add(ps, BorderLayout.CENTER); 
	this.setVisible(true);
	this.setDefaultCloseOperation(JDialog.DISPOSE_ON_CLOSE);
	this.setTitle("Alien Attack");
	addKeyListener(this);
	Thread anim = new AnimationThread(this);
	anim.start();
}
public void keyPressed (KeyEvent e){  
	int keyID = e.getKeyCode();
	String pressed = KeyEvent.getKeyText(e.getKeyCode());
	if(pressed.equals("Left") && !left) {
		left = true;
		ps.x_speed -= 3;	
		ps.moving = true;
	}
	if(pressed.equals("Right") && !right) {
		right = true;
		ps.x_speed += 3;
		ps.moving = true;
	}
	}  
	public void keyReleased (KeyEvent e){  
	int keyID = e.getKeyCode();
	String pressed = KeyEvent.getKeyText(e.getKeyCode());
	if(pressed.equals("Left")) {
		left = false;
		if(right) {
			ps.x_speed = 3;
		}
		else {
			ps.x_speed = .000000000001;
		}	
	}
	if(pressed.equals("Right")) {
		right = false;
		if(left) {
			ps.x_speed = -3;
		}
		else {
			ps.x_speed = .000000000001;
		}	
	}
	if(pressed.equals("Z")) {
		int i = getFreeId();
		if(i != -1) {
			ps.bullets[i] = new Bullet(ps.x_pos + 13 , ps.y_pos + 18, -5, ps.enemies, ps, i);
			ps.totalShots++;
		}
	}
	if(pressed.equals("X")) {
		int i = getFreeId();
		if(i != -1) {
			ps.bullets[i] = new Bullet(ps.x_pos + 36 , ps.y_pos + 18, -5, ps.enemies, ps, i);
			ps.totalShots++;
		}
	}
	if(pressed.equals("Space")) { 
		int[] i = getFreeIds();
		if(i[0] != -1 && i[1] != -1) {
			ps.bullets[i[0]] = new Bullet(ps.x_pos + 13, ps.y_pos + 18, -5, ps.enemies, ps, i[0]);
			ps.bullets[i[1]] = new Bullet(ps.x_pos + 36, ps.y_pos + 17, -5, ps.enemies , ps,  i[1]);
			ps.totalShots += 2;
		}
	}
	if(!right && !left && !up && !down) {
		ps.moving = false;
	}
	}  
public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e) {
}
public int[] getFreeIds() {
	int first = -1;
	int second = -1;
	if(ps.powerUps[1]) {
		for(int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
			if(ps.bullets[i] != null) {
				continue;
			}
			first =  i;
		}
		for(int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
			if(ps.bullets[i] != null) {
				continue;
			}
			if(i != first) {
				second =  i;
			}
		}
	} else {
		for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
			if(ps.bullets[i] != null) {
				continue;
			}
			first =  i;
		}
		for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
			if(ps.bullets[i] != null) {
				continue;
			}
			if(i != first) {
				second =  i;
			}
		}
	}
	int[] ids = {first, second};
	return ids;
}
public int getFreeId() {
	int first = -1;
	if(ps.powerUps[1]) {
		for(int i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
			if(ps.bullets[i] != null) {
				continue;
			}
			first =  i;
		}
	} else {
		for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
			if(ps.bullets[i] != null) {
				continue;
			}
			first =  i;
		}
	}
	return first;
}
class Bullet extends Rectangle2D.Float {
	public int y_speed;
	private Enemy[] enemies;
	public int y;
	PaintSurface ps;
	int index;
	public boolean isBad;

	public Bullet(int x, int y, int y_speed, Enemy[] enemies, PaintSurface ps, int index) {
		super(x, y, 2, 4);
		this.x = x;
		this.enemies = enemies;
		this.ps = ps;
		this.index = index;
		this.y_speed = y_speed;
		if(y_speed > 0) {
			isBad = true;
		}
	}
	public void move() {
		Rectangle2D r = new Rectangle2D.Float(super.x, super.y, 2, 4);	
		if(!isBad) {			
			for (int i = 0; i < enemies.length; i ++) {
				if(enemies[i] != null && enemies[i].intersects(r)) {
					ps.totalHits++;
					if(!ps.powerUps[0]) {
						ps.destroyB(index);
					}
					enemies[i].destroy();
				}
			}
		}
		if(isBad) {
			Rectangle2D ship = new Rectangle2D.Float(ps.x_pos, ps.y_pos, 53, 51);
			Rectangle2D me = new Rectangle2D.Float(super.x, super.y, 2, 4);
			if(me.intersects(ship)) {
				ps.takeHit();
				ps.destroyB(index);
			}
		}
		super.y += y_speed;
		y = (int)(super.y);
		x = (int)(super.x);
	}
}

class Enemy extends Rectangle2D.Float {
	public double x_speed = 0;
	public int y;
	public double x;
	PaintSurface ps;
	int index;
	boolean isBonus = false;
	int bonusType; //0 for red bullet, 1 for MultiShot

	public Enemy(int x, int y, PaintSurface ps, int index, double speed) {
		super(x, y, 33,37);
		this.ps = ps;
		this.x = x;
		this.y = y;
		this.x_speed = speed;
		this.index = index;
	}
	public void move() {
		Rectangle2D r = new Rectangle2D.Float(super.x, super.y, 33, 37);
		super.x += x_speed;
		this.x = super.x;
		if(x < 2 && x_speed < 0 || x > 263 && x_speed > 0) {
			x_speed = -x_speed;
			super.y += 45;
			this.y = (int)(super.y);
		}
	}
	public void destroy() {
		if(isBonus) {
			ps.powerUps[bonusType] = true;
			ps.puCounter[bonusType] += 175;
			ps.bonusPoints += 50;
		}
		ps.destroyE(index);
	}
		
}
class AnimationThread extends Thread {
	JDialog gs;

	public AnimationThread(JDialog gs) {
		this.gs = gs;
	}

	public void run() {
		try {
			ps.started = true;
			ps.setDimensions(300, 400);
		}
		catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
		while(true) {
			gs.repaint();
			try {
				Thread.sleep(20);
			} catch (Exception e) {
				e.printStackTrace();
			}
		}
	}
}
		
class PaintSurface extends JPanel {
	double x_speed = .000000000001;
	int y_pos, x_pos, totalShots, totalHits, bonusPoints, numberCounter, width, height = 0;
	Image plane, planemoving, planehit, bonus, bonus1, enemy;
	ImageObserver observer;
	Toolkit tk = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit();
	public boolean started, turnRed, lost, won, moving = false;
	public int hitPoints = 50;
	Bullet[] bullets = new Bullet[900];
	Enemy[] enemies = new Enemy[100];
	double[] enemySpeeds = {-.5, -.6, -.8, -1.1, -1.5, -2, -2.6, -3.4, -4.2, -5.1, -6.1, -7.2, -8.4, -9.7, -11.1};
	double[] enemyNumber = {1, 2, 4, 7, 11, 16, 22, 29, 37, 46, 56, 67, 79, 92, 106};
	boolean[] powerUps = {false, false}; //0 is Power Bullets, 1 is Multi Shot, Others are open
	int[] puCounter = {0, 0};

	public void setDimensions(int width, int height) {
		loadImages();
		this.width=width-15;
		this.height = height-65;
		this.x_pos = width/2;
		this.y_pos = 315;
	}
	public void takeHit() {
		hitPoints--;
		turnRed = true;
		if(hitPoints < 1) {
			lost = true;
		}
	}
	public void destroyE(int index) {
		enemies[index] = null;
	}
	public void destroyB(int index) {
		bullets[index] = null;
	}	
	public void setLoose() {
		lost = true;
	}
	public int getEnemyBulletID() {
		int first = -1;
		for(int i = 0; i < 90; i++) {
			if(ps.bullets[i] != null) {
				continue;
			}
			first =  i;
		}
		return first;
	}
	public void loadImages() {
		bonus = tk.getImage("bonus.png");
		bonus1 = tk.getImage("bonus1.png");
		enemy = tk.getImage("enemy.png");
		plane = tk.getImage("plane.png");
		planehit = tk.getImage("planehit.png");
		planemoving = tk.getImage("planemoving.png");
	}
		
	public int getScore() {
		if(totalHits != 0 && totalShots != 0) {
			if ( ((int)(((double)(totalHits)/(double)(totalShots))*totalHits + bonusPoints)) < 1) {
				return 1;
			}	
			return (int)((((double)(totalHits)/(double)(totalShots)))*totalHits + bonusPoints);
		}
		return 0;
	}

	public void paint(Graphics g) {
		Graphics2D g2 = (Graphics2D)g;
		if(started && !lost && !won) {		
			g2.setRenderingHint(RenderingHints.KEY_ANTIALIASING, RenderingHints.VALUE_ANTIALIAS_ON);
			g.drawImage(tk.getImage("background.png"), 0, 0, this);
			if(turnRed) {
				g.drawImage(planehit, x_pos, y_pos, this);
				turnRed = false;
			} 
			else if(!moving){
				g.drawImage(plane, x_pos, y_pos, this);
			}
			else {
				g.drawImage(planemoving, x_pos, y_pos, this);
			}
			if(x_pos < 0 && x_speed < 0) {
			}
			else if(x_pos > width - 50 && x_speed > 0) {
			}
			else { 
				x_pos += x_speed; 
			}
			for(int i = 0; i < puCounter.length; i++) {
				if(powerUps[i]) {
					puCounter[i]--;
				}
				if(puCounter[i] < 1) {
					powerUps[i] = false;
				}
			}
			for(int i = 0; i < bullets.length; i++) {
				if(bullets[i] != null) {
					if(powerUps[0] && !bullets[i].isBad) {
						bullets[i].y_speed = -7;
						g2.setColor(Color.RED);
					}
					else if(!powerUps[0] && !bullets[i].isBad) {
						bullets[i].y_speed = -5;
					}
					bullets[i].move();
					if(bullets[i] != null) {
						g2.fill(bullets[i]);
						g2.setColor(Color.BLACK);
						if(bullets[i].y < 0) {
							bullets[i] = null;
						}
						if(bullets[i] != null && bullets[i].y > 400) {
							bullets[i] = null;
						}
					}
				}
			}
			int counter = 0;
			for(int i = 0; i < enemies.length; i++) {
				if(enemies[i] != null) {
					enemies[i].move();
					int random = (int)(Math.random() * 200);
					if(random == 2) {
						int b = getEnemyBulletID();
						if(b != -1) {
							bullets[b] = new Bullet((int)(enemies[i].x) + 17, (int)(enemies[i].y) + 38 , 5, enemies, this, b);
						}	
					}
					g2.fill(enemies[i]);
					if(!enemies[i].isBonus) {
						g.drawImage(enemy, (int)(enemies[i].x), enemies[i].y, this);
					}
					else {
						switch(enemies[i].bonusType) {
							case 0:
								g.drawImage(bonus, (int)(enemies[i].x), enemies[i].y, this);
							break;
							case 1:
								g.drawImage(bonus1, (int)(enemies[i].x), enemies[i].y, this);
							break;
						}
					}
					if(enemies[i].y + 37 > 350) {
						setLoose();
					}
					counter++;
				}
			}
			if(counter < 1) {
				if(numberCounter > 13) {
					won = true;
				}
				for(int i =0; i < enemyNumber[numberCounter]; i++) {
					int random = (int) (Math.random() * 30);
					enemies[i] = new Enemy((width  + (39*i)) , 5, this, i, enemySpeeds[numberCounter]);
					if(random  == 2) {
						enemies[i].isBonus = true;
						int random2 = (int) (Math.random() * 2);
						if(random2 == 0) {
							enemies[i].bonusType = 0;
						}
						else {
							enemies[i].bonusType = 1;
						}
					}
				}
				numberCounter++;
			}
			g2.setFont(new Font("Times New Roman", Font.BOLD, 12));
			if(powerUps[1] && powerUps[0]) {
				g.drawString("Multi Shot: " + puCounter[1]/35, 5, 330);
				g.drawString("Fire Shot: " + puCounter[0]/35, 5, 320);
			}
			else if(powerUps[0]) {
				g.drawString("Fire Shot: " + puCounter[0]/35, 5, 330);
			}
			else if(powerUps[1]) {
				g.drawString("Multi Shot: " + puCounter[1]/35, 5, 330);
			}
			g.drawString("HP: " + hitPoints, 5, 340 );
			g.drawString("Enemies Left: " + (counter), 5, 350 );
			g.drawString("Level: " + numberCounter , 5, 360);
			Line2D line2 = new Line2D.Float(0, 310, width+20, 310);
			g2.draw(line2);
		}
		NumberFormat nf = NumberFormat.getNumberInstance();
		nf.setMaximumFractionDigits(1);
		if(lost) {
			g2.setFont(new Font("Impact", Font.PLAIN, 30));
			g2.drawString("GAME OVER: YOU LOST!", 15, 200);
			g2.setFont(new Font("Times New Roman", Font.PLAIN, 16));
			g2.drawString("Shots Fired: "+ totalShots, 15, 220);
			g2.drawString("Shots Hit: "+ totalHits, 15, 235);
			g2.drawString("Hit Percent: "+ nf.format(((double)(totalHits)/(double)(totalShots)*100)) + "%", 15, 250);
			g2.drawString("Bonus: PowerUps * 50 = "+ bonusPoints, 15, 265);
			g2.drawString("Your Final Score Was: " + getScore(), 15, 295);
			g2.drawString("You Ended With: " + hitPoints + "hp", 15, 345);
		}
		if(won) {
			g2.setFont(new Font("Impact", Font.PLAIN, 30));
			g2.drawString("GAME OVER: YOU WON!", 5, 100);
			g2.setFont(new Font("Times New Roman", Font.PLAIN, 16));
			g2.drawString("Shots Fired: "+ totalShots, 15, 220);
			bonusPoints += 200;
			g2.drawString("Shots Hit: "+ totalHits, 15, 235);
			g2.drawString("Hit Percent: "+ nf.format(((double)(totalHits)/(double)(totalShots)*100)) + "%", 15, 250);
			g2.drawString("Bonus: PowerUps * 50 + 200 for winning = "+ bonusPoints, 15, 265);
			g2.drawString("Your Final Score Was: " + getScore(), 15, 295);
			g2.drawString("You Ended With: " + hitPoints + "hp", 15, 345);
		}	
	}
}

}
[/code]

Please comment and critique.

Read full topic
